title: How to Do Your Makeup Like Kristen Stewart

steps.headline: Use a light brown eye shadow over your eye.
Take the darker of the browns and put that in the crease of your eye and outer 'V' and brush it down under your bottom lash line.
Put a thin line of eyeliner on your upper lash line and waterline.
Use a regular mascara on your top lashes.
If you want to, Curl your eyelashes.
If you want, Apply a light shade of gloss.
steps.description: but remember Kristen hate sticky lip gloss.

steps.headline: Kristen has a very clear face so, Cover up any acne.
Use a foundation that matches your skin tone, for a very natural look.

text: Eye Makeup Use a light brown eye shadow over your eye.  Take the darker of the browns and put that in the crease of your eye and outer 'V' and brush it down under your bottom lash line.  Put a thin line of eyeliner on your upper lash line and waterline.  Use a regular mascara on your top lashes.  If you want to, Curl your eyelashes.  Lips Use a light lipstick.  Apply lip liner.  If you want, Apply a light shade of gloss. but remember Kristen hate sticky lip gloss. Foundation and Cover Up Kristen has a very clear face so, Cover up any acne.  Use a foundation that matches your skin tone, for a very natural look.
sentences: Eye Makeup Use a light brown eye shadow over your eye.
Take the darker of the browns and put that in the crease of your eye and outer 'V' and brush it down under your bottom lash line.
Put a thin line of eyeliner on your upper lash line and waterline.
Use a regular mascara on your top lashes.
If you want to, Curl your eyelashes.
If you want, Apply a light shade of gloss.
but remember Kristen hate sticky lip gloss.
Foundation and Cover Up Kristen has a very clear face so, Cover up any acne.
Use a foundation that matches your skin tone, for a very natural look.
